_meanings:
{@--2@} A pimple or eruption
on the face.

{@--6@} pocket. (The word
{#varaMqalaMbuka#} in {#yadidAnImahaM varaMqalaMbuka iva#}
{#dUramutkzipya pAtitaH#} <ls>Mk. 1.</ls> is of
doubtful meaning; it seems to
mean ‘an over-hanging or 
projecting wall’, which, if raised high,
is sure to topple down; so in the
case of the Sūtradhāra whose 
expectations were raised very high only
to be cruelly disappointed).
